frame.name: Part_ordered_segments
frame.definition: <def-root>In this frame a <fen>Part</fen> is part of a larger <fen>Whole</fen> comprised of parts that are ordered. The <fen>Part</fen>s can be ordered temporally (first to last and vice versa) or vertically (down to up and vice versa). The <fen>Part</fen> can be modified by the <fen>Part_prop</fen> or the number of the part can be given by <fen>Ordinality</fen>. <ex></ex> <ex> I sat through the <fex name="Ordinality">first</fex> <fex name="Part_prop">interminable</fex> <t><fex name="Part">act</fex></t> <fex name="Whole"> of the play </fex> . </ex> <ex> Tess finished a <fex name="Whole"> dissertation</fex> <t><fex name="Part">chapter</fex></t> . </ex> <ex>The <fex name="Ordinality">first</fex> <t><fex name="Part">level</fex></t> <fex name="Whole">of rock</fex> consisted of sediment from the Neolithic period.</ex> <ex>The <fex name="Ordinality">last</fex> <t><fex name="Part">layer</fex></t> <fex name="Whole">of sediment</fex> was also the thickest.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Ordinality
FE.definition: <def-root>This is the number of the sequence of <fen>Part</fen>s.<ex> I sat through the <fex name="Ordinality">first</fex> <fex name="Part_prop">interminable</fex> <t><fex name="Part">act</fex></t> <fex name="Whole">of the play</fex> . </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Part_prop
FE.definition: <def-root>A property relating to the <fen>Part</fen> of a <fen>Whole</fen>. <ex> I sat through the <fex name="Ordinality">first</fex> <fex name="Part_prop">interminable</fex> <t><fex name="Part">act</fex></t> <fex name="Whole">of the play</fex> . </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Part
FE.definition: <def-root>A part of a larger <fen>Whole</fen>. <ex> I sat through the <fex name="Ordinality">first</fex> <fex name="Part_prop">interminable</fex> <t><fex name="Part">act</fex></t> <fex name="Whole">of the play</fex> . </ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Whole
FE.definition: <def-root>An undivided entity having all its <fen>Part</fen>s. <ex> I sat through the <fex name="Ordinality">first</fex> <fex name="Part_prop">interminable</fex> <t><fex name="Part">act</fex></t> <fex name="Whole">of the play</fex> . </ex></def-root>
